00008 #ifndef TRSL_WEIGHT_ACCESSOR_HPP
00009 #define TRSL_WEIGHT_ACCESSOR_HPP
00010 
00011 namespace trsl {
00012   
00022   template<typename WeightType, typename ElementType>
00023   struct weight_accessor
00024   {
00030     WeightType operator()(ElementType const& e) const
00031       {
00032         return 1;
00033         // You can create your own accessor by copying this class
00034         // and returning something like
00035         //   return e.getWeight();
00036       }
00037   };
00038 
00060   template<typename WeightType, typename ElementType>
00061   class mp_weight_accessor
00062   {
00063   public:
00065     typedef WeightType (ElementType::*WeightAccessorMethodPointer)() const;
00066     
00075     mp_weight_accessor(WeightAccessorMethodPointer wptr = NULL) :
00076       wptr_(wptr) {}
00077     
00083     WeightType operator()(ElementType const& e) const
00084       {
00085         if (wptr_ == NULL)
00086           return 1;
00087         return (e.*wptr_)();
00088       }
00089   private:
00090     WeightAccessorMethodPointer wptr_;
00091   };
00092 
00093 }

00095 #endif // include guard
